hu.kazocsaba.math.geometry

Class Circle3

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.kazocsaba.math.geometry.Circle3

  • public class Circle3
extends Object
    A circle in 3D space. It is specified by the center C, the radius r, and the unit normal N of the plane containing the circle.
    Author:
    Kaz√≥ Csaba

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Circle3 create(Vector3 center, Vector3 normal, double radius)
      Creates a new circle.
      ImmutableVector3 getCenter()
      Returns the center of the circle.
      ImmutableVector3 getNormal()
      Returns the unit-length normal vector of the plane containing the circle.
      Plane3 getPlane()
      Returns the plane containing the circle.
      Vector3 getPointAt(double radians)
      Returns the point on the circumference of this circle described by an angle.
      double getRadius()
      Returns the radius of the circle.
      String toString()
      Returns a human-readable string representation of this circle.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static Circle3 create(Vector3 center,
             Vector3 normal,
             double radius)
        Creates a new circle.
        Parameters:
        center - the center
        normal - the normal vector of the plane containing the circle; need not be unit length
        radius - the radius of the circle
        Returns:
        the circle
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the normal vector is too small or the radius is not positive

        Returns the center of the circle.

        Returns the radius of the circle.
        Returns:

      • getNormal

        public ImmutableVector3 getNormal()

        Returns:
        N

      • getPointAt

        public Vector3 getPointAt(double radians)
        Returns the point on the circumference of this circle described by an angle. The point corresponding to the angle zero is unspecified but fixed for a given circle.
        Parameters:
        radians - the angle specifying the point
        Returns:
        the point on the circle

      • getPlane

        public Plane3 getPlane()
        Returns the plane containing the circle.
        Returns:
        the plane of the circle

        Returns:
